basics.name: Árni Hermann Reynisson
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I'm a software engineer focused on creating well-behaved systems with excellent user experience. I get excited when I hear: distributed systems, functional programming, user experience and developer experience.

work.summary: QuizUp is a mobile trivia game with over 80 million users across the world and 1.2M daily active users peak.
highlights: VP Engineering: Mid 2015. Lead effort to split QuizUp monolith server codebase into microservices. Introduced Scala, Finagle, Kafka and other tools to achieve scale needed for NBC TV show with high throughput, low latency and cost efficient services.

Introduced QuizUp to monorepo built with Pants which had a big impact on developer experience with more knowledge sharing, less friction to share code, homogeneous CI and deployments for all services. This allowed us to easily deploy either parts of our stack or the entire stack dozens of times per day.
Team lead: Mid 2014. Platform team developed services and web tools for internal usage.
Team Platform implemented trivia game/social network on quizup.com in React with feature parity towards the mobile clients (iOS and Android).
We also implemented MyQuizup, a user facing product on quizup.com which allows users to create their own trivia topics and questions.
Moreover, we implemented QuizUp in 6 languages in collaboration with our mobile teams to prepare for a parnership with Coca Cola in the 2014 FIFA World Cup.
Sofware engineer: Server and web engineering. Devops. On-call rotations.
Leadership: Team lead, team building and organization changes. Knowledge sharing by giving tech talks, talking at 'papers we love' meetings and hosting community meetups.

work.summary: Sprettur (now Kolibri) is an agile consultancy with emphasis on customer parnership: team from Sprettur working with a team from customer on product development.
Gagnavarslan (now AZAZO) makes a product called CoreData. CoreData is a powerful work-management system for employees and managers.
Hugsmiðjan is one of the oldest web studios in Iceland. Their CMS Eplica is one of the most popular CMS for the enterprises in Iceland.
highlights: Part of team which built first version of Industria's TV platform, set top boxes built with browser technologies (Opera, HTML, CSS and JavaScript)
